name: Elwood (swimgod)
description:
Prototyping mechanics for a turn-based combat game. This is our first effort in using the Unity game engine.

We didn't work on much UI, so some of the skills are just mapped to hotkeys.

Hotkey 1 - Cosmic Blast (AOE damage)

Hotkey 2 - Flame Thrower (Deals damage in a direction)

Hotkey 4 - Multi-Target (Deals damage to 2 selected targets)

Hotkey 5 - Doppleganger (Summons a doppleganger)
